Hi Lauren, 
There are many social media policies on the Knowledge Network that you may find useful in crafting your own policy. I have included them below. 
-Social Media Policy from the City of Lake Forest http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303620/Social_Media_Policy
-Management Policy-Social Media from the City of Reno http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303903/Management_Policy__Social_Media
-Albemarle County, Virginia Social Media Policy http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301488/Albemarle_County_Virginia_Social_Media_Policy
-Arlington County Social Media Policy and Guidelines http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6523/Arlington_County_Social_Media_Policy_and_Guidelines
-Montgomery, Ohio Social Media Policy http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/301379/Montgomery_Ohio_Social_Media_Policy
-Social Media Policy - City of Chandler, AZ http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/300737/Social_Media_Policy__City_of_Chandler_AZ
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Laura Karpaviciute
text: The City of Tamarac is currently revising its Social Media Policy.  We are looking to establish the guidelines for the utilization of the City's social media accounts, as well as for the employee use of their personal social media.  We would be very grateful if you could share your social media policy with us.
title: Social Media Policy
